original_text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour, for to give repentance to Israel, and forgiveness of sins.
korean_text: 이스라엘에게 회개함과 죄 사함을 주시려고 그를 오른손으로 높이사 임금과 구주로 삼으셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand
to be a Prince and a Saviour
for to give repentance to Israel
